roleset.name: sharp, sudden, stinging pain
roleset.note: TWINGE-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense-groupings. Verbnet class tingle-40.8.2. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie. (from twinge.01-v)

example.name: Example without causer
example.text: I winced as one of my broken teeth twinged.

example.name: example with causer of pain
example.text: The bee twinged him until he made himself tear, and so mastered himself.
